entry.tran: 蒙古国的;蒙古国人的;蒙古语的;蒙古国文化的
entry.def: Mongolian means belonging or relating to Mongolia, or to its people, language, or culture.
A Mongolian is a Mongolian citizen, or a person of Mongolian origin.
Mongolian is the language that is spoken in Mongolia.

example.ex: Until August of this year there was no complete translation of the New Testament in Mongolian.
example.tran: 直到今年8月，还没有《新约全书》的蒙古语全译本。

means.word_mean: 1. a member of the nomadic peoples of Mongolia
2. a family of Altaic language spoken in Mongolia
1. of or relating to the modern Mongolian People's Republic;
2. of or relating to the region of Mongolia or its people or their languages or cultures;
